title: Is it Time to Dump My Boyfriend?
description:
Morgan and her boyfriend are at a crossroads since realizing neither is willing to live in the town that the other would like to settle in. - Dr. Laura: "Love is not enough."

What did you give up to be with the one you love? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
